label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_021
content:
## 2026-01-23 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS 23800 req | p50: 16.6ms p95: 39.6ms p99: N/A | err: 2.1% (502 errors) | success: 97.9%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS 251 req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /ttl-change: REQUESTS 68 req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /propagation: REQUESTS 36 sites | p50: 60s p95: 140s | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /health-check: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS 118 | p50: N/A p95: N/A | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /change-request: REQUESTS 7 | p50: N/A p95: N/A | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /cache-behavior: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A | err: 0% | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 24% | Mem 60% | Disk 78% | Conns: 1215 | Net: 74/104 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 20% | Mem 48% | Disk 58% | Conns: 1025 | Net: 58/74 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 44% | Mem 66% | Disk 54% | Conns: N/A | Net: 95/135 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 28% | Mem 71% | Disk 64% | Conns: N/A | Net: 14/19 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active 39 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 50 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-ixfr: active 212 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 250 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-propagation: active 36 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 50 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-queue: active 2 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 10 | avg_wait 0ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 89.3% | Bandwidth: 1.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 1500

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNS propagation delay on cloud-dns-sync-01: 60s
- [WARNING] Cache prefetch coverage at 82%
- [INFO] Zone transfer success rate 100%
- [INFO] TTL changes applied to 9 zones
- [INFO] DNSSEC signatures refreshed 118 times
- [INFO] Health checks authoritative reachability 99.99%
- [INFO] Change requests processed: 7, all applied successfully
- [INFO] Zonefile lint errors: 2, DNSSEC policy violations: 0, audit log gaps: 0

### Deployments & Changes
- Migrated 16 zones off-peak; clean transfer stats and improved propagation p95 relative to peak-window attempts
- Enabled prefetch for 2 more resolver POPs (82% coverage); cache hit rate improved slightly
- Executed bulk update of CAA and DMARC TXT records across 9 zones; ensured record-set size constraints respected via pre-check
- Reviewed DNSSEC signature validity window parameters; confirmed uniform policy across signed zones

### Events
- Migrated 16 zones off-peak; clean transfer stats and improved propagation p95 relative to peak-window attempts
- Enabled prefetch for 2 more resolver POPs (82% coverage); cache hit rate improved slightly
- Executed bulk update of CAA and DMARC TXT records across 9 zones; ensured record-set size constraints respected via pre-check
- Reviewed DNSSEC signature validity window parameters; confirmed uniform policy across signed zones

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Shift: F. Delgado. 0 pages. 6 tickets. Status: Normal; off-peak migrations proceeding smoothly with improved cache performance
